Name: Zoning, 58 Nixon Court Rezoning II, Brooklyn (N 240376 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 240376 ZRK (58 Nixon Court Rezoning II) submitted by SLG Assets, Inc, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
